title: Is my NonMuslim Step Father my Mahram? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Medina from Germany alayum so my non-muslim mother will probably marry like a Christian man and I wanted to ask if he will become my Maham even though they are not marrying in an Islamic way if they marry in a Christian way if they are both Christians and they marry in a church and also in the Civil marriage courts or without the Civil marriage Court in this case they become man and wife according to their religion and hence he would become your father-in-law according to their religion and he would become your Maham as well and Allah Knows Best
